Karin van der Laag (amụrụ na 2 Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1971), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa na onye na-eduzi ndi nkiri A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri a ma ama The Story of an African Farm, Cape Town na Hoodlum & Son

Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi na-eme ihe nkiri yana onye ọka ikpe, onye nkuzi na onye nduzi maka National Eistedfod Association, The South African National Community Theatre Association (SANCTA) na Talent Africa.
A mụrụ ya na 2 Ọgọstụ 1971 na South Africa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts na Drama na Bekee na Mahadum nke Cape Town ma mesịa nweta Diploma nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Speech na Drama.
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri telivishọn ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwatakịrị na mmepụta SABC Christmas They Came from Afar
N'afọ 1998, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Maggie Webster' na ihe nkiri a ma ama Isidingo
Ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ahụ ruo afọ iri na abụọ
N'afọ 2011, ọ meriri SAFTA Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na TV Soap maka ọrụ a
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi na-eduzi ndị na-eme ihe nkiri maka soapie site na 2000 ruo 2010.
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri telivishọn: Zero Tolerance, Going Up, Hard Copy, Justice for All, na Sorted
N'afọ 2015, o mere nke mbụ na mba ụwa na ọrụ 'Gail Ferreira' na obere ihe nkiri telivishọn Cape Town
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na usoro ihe nkiri: The Three Investigators na Wild at Heart
Ewezuga telivishọn, ọ sonyeere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri mba ụwa: The Story of an African Farm, Les Deux Mondes, Hoodlum and Son, Hey Boy and God is African.
Ọ bụ onye na-enweta ihe nrite Casting Director.
O meriri ihe nrite FNB National Vita maka Best Performance site n'aka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ọrụ na-atọ ọchị
E mechara họpụta ya maka onyinye FNB Vita ọzọ maka arụmọrụ kachasị mma na Musical Theater

Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ meriri ma FNB Vita Award na Fleur du Cap award maka Best Actress in a Supporting Role. N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọkàikpe na asọmpi eziokwu The Final Cut nke gosipụtara na SABC3.
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye edemede na onye nlekọta edemede na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na telivishọn.
